title: I just don't enjoy the game anymore
body: I've loved Leagues for a long time I have been spamming games for about 2 years since I got started on it. It never got old to me every game felt fresh and different and exciting. But now every game is stale and usually one sided most games are 20 minute surrenders and many games are over in less then that. This week alone I had a 17 minute win a 15 minute loss and a 18 minute loss. People go afk at the drop of a hat now because they know if they fall behind there is no coming back. I don't really want to quit playing but I just feel like this game is not the same game I fell in love with. I have put in thousands of games and countless hours without a second though. Anyway I I just wanted to hear someones else's take on the game right now compared to in the past.

replies.body: Honesty this patch is just a complete mess. I'm not even sure what can be done to bring the game back to what it was. Not having fun at all even with friends. The fact that these threads have been popping up everyday for months is a big indication that the past few patches have taken the game in an awkward direction.

I agree. Im not a fan of a lot of the changes riot has made over last season and this preseason. From time to time i think to myself....this game is so screwed up anymore, why do i continue to play it?! But alas.....i love league of legends and probably always will. Maybe one day Riot will take it to far for me and ill actually quit, but til then ill be on the rift.

I think the biggest problem lately is the massive power creep. Every new champ like kindred kench and ekko are miles better then old champions leaving you literally 0 reason to play old champions. And then you have to ban them every patch until riot finally nerfs them like they did with Garen and Darius. Meanwhile champions like Yorick or Galio I will go years without seeing them in game and Riot doesn't even have the decency to give them a small buff.

I tried that but it just felt meh, a little to easy and quick.

I've ranted enough about it, but my simple take on it right now is that I'm only ever having fun when I play with friends, and even then, I'm only doing it because they want me to play with them.  The preseason is dogshit and season 6 will be awful unless Riot does something intelligent to fix this mess they've created...which judging from their take on how the season is going won't happen.  I think I'm going to have to find a new game to play pretty soon.

Same boat, i'm one of the last of my group still hoping league improves.

I really enjoy many aspects of it, and want it to return to its former glory.  Barely play now just keeping up to date with the PBE / boards. My group for the most part has swapped over to HotS. Pretty solid, getting actual rewards for "champion mastery" is great.

My cousin who I used to play leagues with all the time quit the game and it really was depressing now my best friend is barely on either.
But HotS basically sucks though. Theres no actual skill at anything needed to play it. No cs, no items, no warding.....no meaningful decisions at all. Its like L.o.L. or Dota 2 for dummies haha

It certainly has less of a focus on individual skill and more on team coordination / focus. That's the main reason I want to see league improve again. HotS Is no good for soloq but for playing with a group its currently in a much better state than league.  

Many of the characters are very well designed as well particularly when you compare some of them to their closest league counterparts. (Artanis vs Trynd,  Greymane vs Nid)
With a community that insists this is a serious game with tactical decisions....and it makes me sad that they believe this.

Same I am looking for other games to play right now, I don't give a fuck if you want best of 3 in lcs Riot if you ruin the game to make timing easier. Every game is 20 minutes I feel like.

The game is exponentially more frustrating now than it was last year. I feel like everyone does more damage now and dies faster, and that fits in with the dreadful snowballing pace. Every time I die now I get frustrated by some cheap gimmick that always seems to new to this patch or indirectly buffed. 
Don't get me wrong, I've been calling things OP for 2 years, but I've never felt like this before. I feel like every time I die there's just nothing I can do in the moment to counter it. For instance, playing against Annie, where it's almost impossible for her to not 1 hit a squishy or multiperson stun. 
Or even worse, playing against a garen or darius, who do the most damage in the game yet have 5k HP and can't be peeled at all.
This season just seems like its full of gimmicks that leave me saying "oh come on." or "seriously what am i supposed to do about the 45% CDR fizz that just jumped over my front line and 1 hit me."
I used to be able to blame myself for dying or even blame a teammate when they're feeding, but now it's like, well you were against darius or oh were against soraka no wonder vayne has infinite health despite half our team applying greivous wounds.
There are thousands of games besides League. Play something else for a few weeks/months.
Take a break. Wait for season 6 to start. See how things go. Anything op and we will upvote the crap out of your post.
Take some time off or play with some friends. Try having music on when playing solo. Try to stay away from ranked.
